title: 6 thigns that lasted longer than Flynn's tenure as Trump's NSA
text:
Here are SIX things that lasted longer than Michael Flynn’s 24-day tenure as President Trump’s national security adviser Six things that lasted longer than Flynn's tenure as Trump's NSA Michael Flynn’s tenure at as Trump’s national security adviser lasted only 24 days. (Andrew Harrer / POOL/EPA) NEW YORK DAILY NEWS  32 AM 
On Monday night, President Trump's National Security Adviser Michael Flynn resigned from his post after only 24 days on the job, having admitted that he misled the vice president and other senior officials about discussions he had with Russia's ambassador to the U.S. regarding sanctions. 
His resignation letter capped a historically brief 24-day run in the post — far short of the average tenure of a national security adviser, which is 963 days, according to Politico. 
Here are six things that lasted longer than Flynn's 24-day tenure as the NSA. Pamela Anderson and Rick Salomon were married for 60 days — weeks longer than Flynn’s ill-fated tenure as the national security adviser. (Donald Bowers/Getty Images for The New York Pa) Pamela Anderson's marriage to Rick Salomon 
The former Baywatch babe and ex-Playboy Playmate's marriage to film producer Rick Salomon lasted 60 days . Their ill-fated matrimony — full of fighting and cheating — was one of the few things more trouble-plagued than Flynn's own short tenure. The Golden State Warriors won 28 consecutive games between the 2014-2015 and 2015-2015 seasons, a 247-day stretch. (Nathaniel S. Butler/NBAE/Getty Images) The Golden State Warriors' 28-win streak 
The Warriors won 28 consecutive games between the 2014-2015 and 2015-2016 seasons, the second-longest streak in NBA history. 
The streak began with a win on April 9,. 2015 and ended with a loss to the Milwaukee Bucks on Dec. 12, 2015, a glorious stretch that spanned 247 days. 
President Trump could learn a thing or two from the franchise about one his favorite topics: WINNING! Kim Kardashian’s social media blackout lasted nearly three months — more than 60 days longer than Flynn’s tenure as national security adviser. (Lionel Cironneau/AP) Kim Kardashian's social media blackout 
Following the robbery of her Paris hotel room last November, and the hospitalization of her husband Kanye West shortly after, Kim Kardashian announced that she would take a break from social media. 
For nearly three months, Kardashian honored her reprieve, refraining from using Twitter, Snapchat and Facebook while she got her and West's affairs back in order. 
She returned to social media on Jan. 3. A bad cold can linger far longer than the 24 days Flynn spent as Trump’s national security adviser. (Milan Markovic/Getty Images/iStockphoto) A lingering cold 
A bad cold can set you back weeks. In fact, my wife has been battling a nasty cold bug for more than 28 days at this point! Her symptoms include low-grade fever, runny nose, headache and sore throat. Feel better, honey! A dragonfly, on average, lives about four months. That means, in the time Flynn took to get hired and fired, a dragonfly will have lived nearly it’s entire life! (H_Yasui/Getty Images/iStockphoto) A dragonfly's lifespan 
Most species of dragonflies live an average of about four months , meaning that, in the time that it took Flynn to start his job and get fired, an average dragonfly will have lived most of its life. Just as much pep, but with less controversy! My wife and are currently on our fifth week of a delicious bag of coffee, meaning we’ve been drinking our way through it for longer than Flynn’s entire tenure as the national security adviser! A bag of coffee 
At the beginning of the year, my wife and I received an anniversary gift from some close friends: Several bags of premium coffee from Colectivo Coffee Roasters in Milwaukee, Wis. (Thanks Scott and Jess!). We opened the bag of the Costa Rica Campeon roast shortly after the New Year and it's still going strong after more than 33 days! Join the Conversation:
